item.title: Fletching emote ID?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Maybe I’m not doing it right, or the ID’s too high? But a thread I found on these forums said that 6702 was the knife and log emote, so I used it, and my client crashed.

if(itemUsed == 946 && useWith == 1511 || itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 946) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); setAnimation(6702); addItem(50, 1); sendMessage("You carve a shortbow out of the logs."); addSkillXP(100, 9); }

Any ideas?

Thanks.

Read full topic
